dmca.title: Manufacturer Asks Google to Remove Images
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google, Inc. Customer Support,

This is to request that you please remove a link to a graphic Image that we own. It is currently linked to a company that Is our customer, but which is not authorized to use the image.

High Purity Northwest, which sponsored the unauthorized Meissner graphic image in the Google links, is not clear as to how the link was established, but has agreed to remove all unauthorized Meissner images from its website. While the infringing image has been removed, the Google links have survived, and we want them removed from Google immediately.

1. We own the copyright to the Image of stainless steel filter housings clustered in a group as shown In the following Google links: The copyrighted work at issue is the image that appears in the Google links listed below.

2.	Search query: membrane filters:
http://images.google.com/images?q=%22membrane%20filters% 22&num=20&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&newwindow=1&safe=off&sa=N&tab=wi

Page 3 of search query: 
http://images.google.com/images?q=%22membrane+filters% 22&svnum=20&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&newwindow=1&safe=off&lr=&start=40&sa=N

	The Infringing Web pages are: (see: 3 links Immediately below)
	http://www.highpuritynorthwest.com/sitebuildercontent/sitebuilderpictures/intro3.gif

http://images.google.com/images?q=%22membrane +filters&svnum=20&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&newwindow=1&safe=off&lr=&start=60&sa=N

http://images.google.com/imgres?imgurl= www.highpuritynorthwest.com/sitebuildercontent/sitebuilderpictures/intro3.qlf &imgrefurl= http://www.hichpuritynorthwest.com/id24.html &h=336 &w=302&sz=31&tbnid=K9h4Nu1ARFwJ:&tbnh=114 &tbnw=103&start=64&prev=/images %3Fq%3Dmembrane%2Bfilters%26start%3D60%26svnum%3D20 %26hl%3Den%26lr%3D%26ie%3DUTF-8%26newwindow %3D1%26safe%3Doff%26sa%3DN

3. You may contact me at:	[private]
	Director of Business Development
	Meissner Filtration Products, Inc,
	[private]
	Camarillo. CA 93012
	[private@[private].com

4. Owner of the offending website is: http://www.highpuritynorthwest.com/index.html

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly Infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information In the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that Is allegedly Infringed

7, Signed: 	[private], Director of Business Development.

8. Date:	June 22, 2004
